text: Zisas mbara khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde na khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk guigira bisaŋgi. Nde maaŋ muuŋgiap tuktɨgi fhuvara. Gu guigira nde nzuai, nde maaŋ muuŋgip na khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk, ana mbe kha zɨn rɨgi mpampara vhɨgar farar muuŋgirga, mastet. Nde maaŋ muuŋgip nde khaŋ mbu mbɨkshɨma suanga, ‘Ndu khavgip, khaŋ thav mbugu ŋgɨ.’ Nde maaŋ suanga, ana ŋgɨrga. Nde vhɨra muungeŋ tuktɨgi fhuv ŋaara the ki fhu.” 17.20-21 Mbe bigi kaŋgi gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, buna mueŋ phorga kha vezar ki. Mba kameŋ khaŋ muuŋgi, “Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav mba thamthagi tɨvar, mba ŋina mbatɨga vhararga tuktɨgi, harigi tuav the ki fhuvara.”
